[telegram] <Seko> 2018 was a huge year of evolution and growth for Komodo. Despite an ongoing bear market, the Komodo Development Team delivered several groundbreaking technologies throughout the year. As a result, Komodo was able to make great progress with regard to business development, partnerships, and marketing. To learn more about Komodo’s growth in 2018, as well as updates about plans for 2019, check out our year-end report. https://komodoplatform.com/komodo-2018-year-end-report-final/.
